One of the best puzzle games i ever played, it has a good story,good enviroment,good playability,thousands of submersive puzzles created by other players,etc.
PROS:The story will trigger you easily and the puzzles are instigating but it will make your game progress slowly, good for players that just want a casual thing...
CONS:The graphic,even it being a puzzle game mode they could've made a better graphic. They also could have made the option to choose your sex... 
But with all those Pros and Cons i totally recommend this game to everyone that's just tired of playing cliches... All people should play it definitively.

I gotta say that this is without doubt the best puzzle game I've ever played. The story is fantastic,especially if you have played the first game. Now,I'm not really that much into puzzle games but I certainly had a blast playing this one. Co-op mode was even more fun than the single player mode,as you get to solve puzzles with your friends in a completely new campaign. Getting this game during a sale is an absolute steal,It's usually around 1,99$ and the bundle with the first game is absolutely worth it! These games have aged really well and are still amongst the best puzzle games of all time. 10/10 would meet glados again
Fantastic game! Even better than the first! The story does reference the first and is more enjoyable to follow, so I would recommend playing Portal 1 first.

This is such an amazing game. The puzzles are well built, the voice acting is hilarious, the story is brilliant. I had hours of fun with this game and it's definitely worth the buy.

A fantastic follow-up to a brilliant game.  Lots of fun, great puzzles that push the story along, and it's filled with excellent wit and humor.
You should play the first game before playing this one, as some characters return and the story will make more sense.
Loved the Portal 1, and Portal 2 was a fantastic sequel. Amazing new graphics and story. I own this for both the Xbox 360, Xbox One and on PC.
Yet Another British-voiced Bad (and stoopid) Boy. Yawn. But other than that, a brilliant and witty game. Replayed several times.

me encanta este juego

What to say about Portal? A classic from Valve, that changed the way a puzzle game should be. Portal 2 brought back the formula of the first game, but with a deeper history and characters. The reasons of a company, as Aperture, that used humans as a test subject, for a "greater good", was explained, as well the origin of our lovely psychopath GLaDos. Portal 2 is a must play for anyone who love a good challenge, a amazing history, well made scenarios and deeply developt characters. If you have the chance, buy it now!!
очень крутая игра

史上评分第一的游戏（吃老本的V社），创新的游戏性，耐玩度很高而且，微烧脑的感觉是坠吼的。虽然是起源1引擎早期作品没CG画面一般但是丰富的关卡，双人合作模式和DIY关卡不仅续命而且大大提高游戏的包容性。情节很有趣最后又得到了1代的爱心方块（作为恋物癖觉得好有爱QAQ），就最后剧情看出３意义不大（奶一口）。通完关的小伙伴建议找个好基友一起玩双人模式，有更多过关方法很值得一玩给94/100分（最高给过CSGO GTAV95分）

Después de tantos años, este juego sigue cautivandome, ya sea por sus niveles, mecánicas y arte o por los personajes que a día de hoy estimo demasiado. Si bien no es un juego perfecto, pues tiene errores, para mí es el mejor juego de la historia. 10/10
One of the best games ever made.
艺术品
Игра лучшая в своём роде, с оригинальным сюжетом, хорошо прописанными отношениями персонажей и тд. с нетерпением жду третью часть

This is really one of the bests puzzle games I have played. Storyline is tremendous and puzzles aren't too hard for beginners. You can speedrun this game very easily and improve your memory and movement on games that work with a same engine at the same time! All of the secrets that this game brings you are amazing and a bit genious, I could say. 

And I'm not lying when I say that this game is amazingly fun to play. The only thing that is a lie is... well, complete Portal 1 and you might find that out..

I recommend this to people who like puzzles and enjoys games with a great storyline. You don't need to have good pc to play this either. Number from 1-10? I would say 10. But that's just my opinion and you can make your own if you get this game. 

(Maybe only bad thing about this game/series is that there aren't really any more sequel and there might not came Portal 3..)
Muito bom

If you get a headache while playing this game (just like me) It is clearly that you are not thinking with portals while playing portal. 

Not thinking with portals while playing portal will show the following symptoms:

-Motion sickness
-Headache
-Dizziness
-Your blood turns to Gasoline
-Love for Lemons
-Not doing enough for science

Please contact your nearest Apperture Science facillity center for diagnosis and a free run of our testing course.

Моя любимая игра : "юмор, головоломки, экшен" всё на достойном уровне. Сейчас прошел около 20 раз (Просто если знать головоломки, они проходится за 2 минуты). В целом игра проходится за 2 часа непрерывного геймплея (и если не тупить), но все равно покупайте! Игра очень сильно развилась от первой части и русский язык есть.

Portal 2 has been one of my personal favourite video games for ages and I adore it. The gameplay, the lore, the music: everything. And even after replaying it at least 2 years after I last played it and even after over 8 years since release, it is still one of the best singleplayer experiences out there. So i hope everyone plays this game.

Ma NOTE GLOBALE : 19.5/20

[h1] LES PLUS [/h1] 

[list]
[*] L'humour de Glados et des autres personnages
[*] Les énignes complexes et une évolution progressive 
[*] Graphismes beau encore maintenant
[*] L'OST est juste magnifique
[*] La Co-op vraiment très sympa ( malgrès qu'elle soit plutôt courte )
[*] L'éditeur de niveaux qui rajoute de la durabilité ( pour les créateurs et pour les joueurs )
[*] Une belle moralité 
[*] Un rebondissement EPIC
[*] Les personnages très attachants
[*] Le secret de Mr.Rat et les autres easter eggs
[/list]

[h1] LES MOINS [/h1]

[*] Aboslument rien et c'est sa le problème de ce jeu , tout est excellent , c'est un chef d'oeuvre !
[*] Bon pour certains , les égnimes peuvent être compliqués et demandé un guide/walktrought


[h1] CONCLUSION [/h1]

Ce jeu est encore une fois une pépite de Vale et un MUST HAVE ( lvl 9001 ( OVER 9000  ) , il combine la réflexion , l'humour , la détente , les graphismes , 
Bref ne perdez plus votre temps à regarder les rewiews et allez l'acheter !! ( 5 € en promo pour ratons )

포탈1의 두배가까이 되는 볼륨, 좀 더 복잡해진 트릭, 다양한 설치물 등 포탈1에 비해 많은것이 발전했어요. 포탈1을 재밌게 플레이 하셨다면 포탈2 역시 사서 플레이할 가치가 있어요. 실험실 챕터는 재밌었는데, 다만 개인적으로 실험실 외부의 맵들은 너무 크기도 크고, 포탈건을 쓸수 있는 벽인지 아닌지도 분간이 잘 안되서 좀 헤맨것도 있었구요, 트릭도 그다지 재밌지가 않아서 별로였어요.
Spent hours playing this game, I wish I hadnt seen a walkthrough of it before I played, but the community maps created allow for endless hours of fun and problem solving. 10/10 would recommend.
This is the best game ever

Şu ana kadar oynadığım en mükemmel oyun.. Evet ben Half-Life serisini defalarca bitirdim G-Man'in repliklerini ezbere biliyorum zaten daha fazla oyun saymama gerek yok sonuçta objektif bakınca fps türünde bugüne kadar yapılmış en mükemmel oyun serisi Half-Life serisi. Cod4 crysis gibi sağlam oyunlarıda oynadım ama Portal 2 toplamda 4 tane karakteriyle hepsini geçti benim gözümde ( GLaDOS,Wheatley,Cave Johnson ve tabiki Taretler ) . Her karakter birbirinden efsane, cidden öyle.

Oyunun evrenine zaten girsen çıkamıyosun. Bir tesis bundan daha fazla etkileyici olamaz Çekirdekler olsun Taretler olsun Başta da GLaDOS olsun hepsi ayrı lezzet katıyor ve sonuçta mükemmel bir sistem oluyor.

Ha bir de Seni Öldürdüğü Kısım'da ilk tuzaktan kaçınca Wheatley comeback comeback !! diye bağırıyor ya orda geri dönün ve ordan atlamanız için söylediklerini dinleyin karnınıza ağrılar girebilir.

二代神作论，在传送门2这里又实现了，基本玩法和一代没有什么区别

我们来看看到底加入哪些新元素
关卡做成了线性通关的感觉，但实际上还是有房间测试的概念加入其中
加入线性流程让游戏场景一下子丰富了起来，在户外一边赶路，一边解除谜题
在跑路关卡中加入一些BGM，也是丰富游戏体验所制作的
从一代的无脑解谜，二代可以说是解谜一会儿，休息一会，或者把解谜加入路程
让游戏变得不那么单调，游戏剧情也有了，一个简单的阴谋

因为场景的变大，我觉得谜题自然就变难了，后期还加入了许多机关
蓝色加速液体，橘黄色弹跳液体等等，思考更加的复杂，解谜的环境也更加复杂
可能会卡关不过作为一款解谜类的游戏，能够做成这个样子，我开始确实没有想到
所以更加期待传送门3，对了G胖还没数过3呢，有生之年

V社的游戏还是挺良心的，素质有保障，所以大家放心的购买
